job_history.role_name: Online Learning Coordinator - Program Training and Support
job_history.work_description: Created and presented district staff development sessions for district purchased online software programs for RtI and General Education settings. Designed implementation plans and strategies for all learning technologies in the district (Administration and Campus staff). Implemented pilot studies and provided results and recommendations on all program purchases.

Presented district staff development sessions for district purchased online software programs for RtI and General Education settings. Provided staff development to campus for SIOP and district writing initiatives. Implemented district purchased online software programs within daily curriculum.

Create and implement curriculum aligned with TEKS for Level 1 ESL students. Implement district purchased online software programs within daily curriculum. Plan, provide, and measure effectiveness of intervention and instruction for students.

Plan, implement, and measure effectiveness of intervention and instruction for students. Implement district purchased online software programs within daily curriculum. Develop and implement creative lesson plans, aligned with TEKS, to facilitate learning.

skills.name: Instructional Design
skills.explanation: Designed implementation plans and strategies for all learning technologies in the district, and created and presented staff development sessions, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Staff Development
skills.explanation: Provided staff development to campus for SIOP and district writing initiatives, and presented district staff development sessions for district purchased online software programs, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Curriculum Development
skills.explanation: Created and implemented curriculum aligned with TEKS for Level 1 ESL students, and developed and implemented creative lesson plans, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Educational Technology
skills.explanation: Implemented district purchased online software programs within daily curriculum, and designed implementation plans and strategies for all learning technologies in the district, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.explanation: Implemented pilot studies and provided results and recommendations on all program purchases, suggesting a solid working proficiency.
